content:
Been working on something HUGE…

Excited to finally release Palo AI! 🚀

It's like having me in your pocket, helping you order the best food near you.

Check it out and let me know what you think.

P.S. Big thanks to the team who helped make this happen. Appeciate it!🙏

#FoodDelivery #AI #LocalEats #PaloAI #Entrepreneurship

Just saw the GPT-4o demo...🤯

The image generation is wild.

I remember when AI images looked like they were made in MS Paint.

Now it's basically indistinguishable from reality...the future is coming fast.

#GPT4o #OpenAI #AI #ArtificialIntelligence #ImageGeneration #Simplify
